title: Upstream downstream
creator_credit: Peter Dimond, Igor Auzins, South Australian Film Corporation and Milton Ingerson Film and Television Productions
brief_description: A family takes a holiday on a houseboat on the River Murray, showing the activities and sites to be enjoyed by all age groups in the riverland’s of South Australia.
